item.title: Kids React to Selena Gomez
item.description:
Kids React to Selena Gomez
Click To Tweet Selena Gomez This Video! http://clicktotweet.com/7C_H2 LIKE & FAVORITE the video to support the show! Share the video on Facebook: http://dft.ba/-ORr Subscribe for a new Kids React video every Sunday: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=thefinebros Selena Gomez Deleted Footage - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=faL4VIxYagk Watch all "KIDS REACT" episodes here: http://www.youtube.com/view_play_list?p=48A68AAE4A70CF56 Leave video suggestions in the comments or at our Facebook on what you want them to watch next. It can be a viral video, a YouTube star, current events, a movie trailer, anything! http://www.facebook.com/FineBros Best way to help support the show and these awesome kids is to FAVORITE & THUMBS UP the video or share it on Facebook/Twitter so people who follow you can discover it and the show can continue to grow. The show is nothing without your support, thank you for your comments and excitement over the series. ------------------------- NOTE ABOUT THE CAST OF "KIDS REACT" : Several kids will not appear in some of the videos due to being out of town. This does NOT mean they are no longer part of the show. If someone is not featured in an episode, don't worry, they will be back once they are available. Also keep in mind that we will always introduce new members every episode, if we did not, some of your favorite cast members would have never become a part of the "Kids React" you know and love today. On behalf of ourselves and the entire cast, thank you for supporting everybody on the show! ------------------------- Created and Directed by Benny & Rafi Fine (The Fine Brothers) MAIN CHANNEL: http://www.youtube.com/thefinebros SECOND CHANNEL: http://www.youtube.com/thefinebros2 FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/FineBros TWITTER: http://www.twitter.com/thefinebros GOOGLE+: http://www.gplus.to/TheFineBros FACEBOOK APP: http://apps.facebook.com/thefinebros T-SHIRTS: http://www.thefinebros.spreadshirt.com IPHONE APP (free): http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-fine-brothers/id398889334?mt=8 SEND US STUFF: TheFineBros P.O. BOX 4324 Valley Village, CA 91617-4324 ---------------------------- Video featured this episode: Meeting Shia by Selena Gomez http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u29L-17pw8c&ob=av3e Subscribe to her channel! http://www.youtube.com/selgomez ----------------------------- This episode featured the following amazing kids! Lia Marie Johnson, age 14 http://www.youtube.com/liamariejohnson http://www.facebook.com/LiaMarieJohnsonFanPage Athena Stamakinley, age 13 http://www.facebook.com/pages/Athena-Stamakinley/185937941419388 http://www.youtube.com/1toastythebaker1 Morgan Bertsch, age 6 http://www.youtube.com/MBDDY Dylan Djoenadi, age 10 (HAPPY BIRTHDAY!) Music by Joseph Carrillo http://www.youtube.com/houseofblackbirds Additional music: http://www.incompotech.com ------------------------------------- Selena Gomez Selena Gomez meets Shia Lebouf Kids React to Selena Gomez Kids React #24 - Selena Gomez Meeting Shia (Selena Gomez) TAGS: selena gomez, shia lebouf, selena gomez meets shia lebouf, meeting shia, kids react, kids react to viral videos, kids react to, kids, react, lol, reaction, movie trailer, thefinebros, the, fine, brothers © KIDS REACT - Fine Brothers Films 2011

item.title: 2011 Teen Choice Awards (Justin & Taylor Dancing to Selena's LYLALS, Swift's & Demi's Choice Awards)
item.description:
2011 Teen Choice Awards (Justin & Taylor Dancing to Selena's LYLALS, Swift's & Demi's Choice Awards)
2011 TCAs Highlights & Favorite Cutaways: - Demi & Selena hugging and showing each other love. - Fergie shows her displeasure that A Plus K does not = a win for her hubby for Teen Choice: Romantic Comedy Actor over her hubby. (0:20) - Ashton offering topical advice & leading the crowd in a sing-along to Katy Perry's "Teenage Dream". (0:30) - Taylor Swift's reaction to Taylor Lautner's win. (1:13) - Justin Bieber, Joey King and Taylor singing & dancing to Selena Gomez & the Scene's "Love You Like A Love Song" performance. (1:17) - Emma Stone presenting Taylor the Ultimate Choice Awards. Taylor's reaction w/ Selena & Ashley Greene. (1:30) - Demi wins Inspire Award. (2:48) NO COPYRIGHT INTENDED. ALL CONTENT BELONGS TO RIGHTFUL OWNERS (FOX BROADCAST).

item.title: Fresh video of London riots: Crowd street rampage
item.description:
Fresh video of London riots: Crowd street rampage
Follow us on http://twitter.com/RT_com and http://www.facebook.com/RTnews Two days of angry clashes in parts of north London have seen 26 police officers injured and over 160 arrests. Small pockets of unrest remain active, according to Scotland Yard. It began as a peaceful protest demanding justice over the death of a 29-year-old man who was shot by police last Thursday. But things turned ugly when demonstrators began attacking police and setting fire to cars and buildings. The violence then spread to a neighbouring district.

item.title: Criminal Fail Compilation || TNL
item.description:
Criminal Fail Compilation || TNL
If you want to follow me, you can do it on the following places. You will get background information about stuff I do. Twitter: http://twitter.com/twisterholland Facebook Fanpage: http://www.facebook.com/TwisterNederland Facebook friendpage: http://www.facebook.com/TwisterNL The first reason I made this video wasn't about to see criminals failing. It's about something in my country that you could get fined 25000 euros when you upload survaillance camera footage of your own store when someone is robbing it. It's invading the privacy of the criminal... The police is only given the right to upload such videos. You're even are lucky when some cops actually is taking a look at it. The police and the government is giving more priority writing out bullshit tickets for speeding 6 kilometers too fast.

item.title: The Crystal Method - Play For Real (Exclusive Machinima Borderlands Music Video)
item.description:
The Crystal Method - Play For Real (Exclusive Machinima Borderlands Music Video)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5MTWSCIDVP4 Click here to watch Machinima -- Exclusive Music Video Series Trailer The Crystal Method - Play For Real (Exclusive Machinima Music Video) Machinima Music Video Series World Premiere! Exclusive debut of Borderlands game-based animated music video for the never-before-released track "Play For Real" by THE CRYSTAL METHOD featuring The Heavy and directed by Machinima director Kootra. Get this featured track "Play For Real", available exclusively at The Crystal Method's web store: http://bit.ly/nQbGQj DIRECTOR'S CHANNEL: http://www.youtube.com/kootra Check out The Crystal Method on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/thecrystalmethod for more details on this exclusive track and brand-new music video! In addition to "Play For Real", get remixes by Dirtyphonics, Le Castle Vania, Left/Right, Digital Pizza and Team Awesomexxxx, all available NOW via www.thecrystalmethod.com! THE CRYSTAL METHOD will set off as featured artists on this summer's debut of IDentity Festival, presented by Skullcandy. It is the first-ever touring electronic ONLY music festival touring throughout North America in August and September! More than 20 shows are on tap for this exciting new traveling extravaganza with top-tier artists performing on multiple stages! Find out more about it at TCM's website - www.thecrystalmethod.com - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - This video will show you: How to make a music video How to Play For Real How to listen to The Crystal Method How to animate Borderlands How to make machinima - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Like Machinima on Facebook! http://facebook.com/machinima Prove your gaming skills on the Respawn Army app http://therespawnarmy.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=machinima FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=machinimarespawn FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=machinimasports FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=machinimarealm FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=machinimatrailer Tags: "the crystal method" crystal method TCM "play for real" borderlands unreal source claptrap music video Machinima kootra Identity festival ID unreleased electronic electro the heavy "how to" artist song track rock yt:quality=high Borderlands "Borderlands 2" Gearbox Software Take 2 Interactive UPC 00710425313301 MPN 710425393327 Music Video exclusive Dirtyphonics "Le Castle Vania" Left/Right Digital Pizza Team Awesomexxxx
